net.sf.jboard.model.reg.dao
Interface RegDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegHibernateDAO, RegPostgresqlDAO
public interface RegDAOInterface

this DAO provide the ability to operate on the system which stores user profiles. it can be a database, or an ldap server, or anything else....

Author:
Charles Gay
